name: Sparky's Journey (Sparklyverse)
description:
Help Sparky in his journey through 10+ platformer levels, some of them with puzzles.

Sparky can move and jump, and collect food. The final goal of every level is to get to the ball.

If you complete a level, a green marker will be put around that level in level selection, but if you get all of the food in the level and then complete it, the entire level square will be turn green as a sign of fully completing that level.

Sometimes, Sparky's friend Linda will join in some levels. She's quicker and younger than Sparky, but she's taller, so Sparky can fit into smaller spaces.

Collecting food serves to unlock costumes in the star-shaped button in the menu. Try to get them all!

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys: Move.

Spacebar or Up Arrow Key: Jump.

(In some levels):

Q: Switch Camera.

E: Stop/Resume Sparky from moving.

R: Stop/Resume Linda from moving.
